Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: unaka badala unake apane rab ke paas sadaabahaar baag hai, jinake neeche naharen bah rahee hongee. unamen ve sadaiv rahenge. allaah unase raazee hua aur ve usase raazee hue. yah kuchh usake lie hai, jo apane rab se dara
jab dharatee is prakaar hila daalee jaegee jaisa use hilaaya jaana hai
aur dharatee apane bojh baahar nikaal degee
aur manushy kahega, "use kya ho gaya hai
us din vah apana vrttaant sunaegee
is kaaran ki tumhaare rab ne use yahee sanket kiya hoga
us din log alag-alag nikalenge, taaki unhen karm dikhae jaen
atah jo koee kanabhar bhee nekee karega, vah use dekh lega
aur jo koee kanabhar bhee buraee karega, vah bhee use dekh lega
saakshee hai jo haanphate-phunkaar maarate hue daudate hai
phir thokaron se chinagaariyaan nikaalate hai
phir subah savere dhaava maarate hote hai
aur isee haal mein ve dal mein ja ghuse
nissandeh manushy apane rab ka bada akrtagy hain
aur nishchay hee vah svayan isapar gavaah hai
aur nishchay hee vah dhan ke moh mein bada drdh hai
to kya vah jaanata nahin jab ugavala liya jaega to qabron mein hai
